name: Vedah
description:
An addictive obstacle game where you save Vedah from obstacles in her dreamland. Freeze, Eraser, Balloon Belly, Shrunkie, Life Loafer and Compo Shield strike to protect her in this exciting obstacle course game.

Features:
- Release finger from screen to pause game
- Game changing power-ups to help evade obstacles 
- Highly addictive drawing mechanism to slide your way through obstacles
- No wifi or internet connection needed
- Designed for all ages

Visit: www.doodlebluestudio.com

Chase dreams with us. Like our pages and dream on.
